summary: A US Army Major stationed in East China in 1944 is ordered to blow up military installations in order to slow down the advancing Japanese Army.
cast: James Stewart|Lisa Lu|Glenn Corbett|Harry Morgan|Frank Silvera|James Best|Rudy Bond|Mike Kellin|Frank Maxwell|Eddie Firestone|Alan Baxter|Leo Chen|Bill Quinn|Peter Chong|P.C. Lee|W.T. Chang|Kei Thin Chung|Bart Conrad|Larry Duran|Charly Ho|C.N. Hu|Gerald Jann|Esther Ying Lee|James B. Leong|Ying Ong Jr.|Robert Ong|Wally Tang|Lawrence Ung|Richard Tien Te Wang|Joe Wing|Beal Wong|Harold Yee|William Yip|Samuel Young Jr.|Elaine Young
title: Sendero de furia
